meanings.definition: A woman who operates a camera.
meanings.sent1: The talented camerawomen captured beautiful photos at the event.
meanings.sent2: The camerawomen filmed the documentary with precision and skill.
meanings.sent3: The camerawomen joked that they had more pictures of the scenery than anyone else.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes were like camerawomen, always focused and ready to capture every moment.
meanings.sent5: The group of camerawomen worked together seamlessly to cover the entire event.

meanings.definition: Women who work with cameras to capture images or videos.
meanings.sent1: During the workshop, the camerawomen learned about different camera angles.
meanings.sent2: The camerawomen collaborated on a project to create a stunning visual story.
meanings.sent3: The camerawomen shared a laugh as they struggled to fit all their equipment in the small room.
meanings.sent4: Their creativity soared as the camerawomen painted with light through their lenses.
meanings.sent5: The dedication of the camerawomen shone through in every frame they captured.
